tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_quantity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE var_calculation (
 calculation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 asset_id INT NOT NULL,
 var_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 calculation_date DATE NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES assets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    asset_id INT,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (asset_id, date),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES asset_info(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE var_calculation (
    asset_id INT,
    date DATE,
    var_value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (asset_id, date),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES asset_info(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assets (
  asset_id INT NOT NULL,
  asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  asset_value DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
  asset_id INT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  daily_return DECIMAL(10, 5) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (asset_id, date),
  FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES assets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE portfolio (
  portfolio_id INT NOT NULL,
  asset_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (portfolio_id, asset_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES assets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE var_results (
  portfolio_id INT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  var_value DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (portfolio_id, date),
  FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolio(portfolio_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Asset (asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    asset_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL)
